ingredient_list: 2 ounces BelGioioso Fresh Mozzarella Pearls cheese
directions_instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together agave, vinegar and olive oil. Add to kale and mix until leaves are coated. Transfer to a bowl and top with strawberries, pine nuts, walnuts and Fresh Mozzarella.
nutrition_summary: 150 calories; protein 5.8g; carbohydrates 9.5g; fat 10.8g; cholesterol 10.1mg; sodium 58.3mg. Full Nutrition
